user_data.target_needs: I primarily sought comfort and fit in my underwear purchases, aiming for products that would provide all-day wearability without irritation or discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that I could wear all day without irritation. The product's description highlighted its softness and durability, which appealed to my need for comfort and longevity. However, my experience indicated that while it was good, it didn't exceed my expectations, suggesting that I was influenced by the promise of comfort but perhaps not fully satisfied with the outcome.

I wanted to find underwear that would fit my body shape well and provide comfort. The product was marketed as designed for curves, which was a significant factor in my decision. However, I was disappointed to find that it did not meet my expectations regarding the material, which led to my negative review. This indicates that I relied on the product's claims but was ultimately let down by the reality.

I needed reliable underwear that would be comfortable and not show under my clothes. The product's features, such as breathability and a no-show design, were key factors in my decision. My positive experience suggests that I made a well-informed choice based on the product's attributes and my needs.

I was searching for a comfortable and modest underwear option. The description mentioned a smooth fit and full coverage, which appealed to my desire for comfort. However, my experience did not align with the expectations set by the description, leading to my dissatisfaction with the fit and material.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, durable, and made from high-quality materials, particularly cotton. I value items that fit well and provide a good level of support, whether it's clothing or accessories. Features like adjustable waistbands, pockets, and breathable fabrics are important to me, as they enhance usability and comfort. I also appreciate vibrant colors and patterns that add a fun element to my purchases. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that do not meet my expectations in terms of material quality, fit, or comfort. I am particularly sensitive to items that are not true to their fabric description or that do not provide the promised comfort and durability. Overall, I seek a balance of style, comfort, and practicality in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want underwear that is comfortable for all-day wear and doesn't cause irritation or discomfort. within my expected price range: [8.46, 15.97]
What specific size or style of underwear do you usually prefer for all-day wear?

I usually prefer underwear that is soft, breathable, and provides good support for all-day wear. Comfort and fit are my priorities when choosing underwear. Do you have any recommendations that match my preferences?
What fabric do you prefer in your underwear for all-day wear?

I prefer underwear made from high-quality cotton fabric for all-day wear. Comfort, breathability, and durability are essential to me when it comes to choosing underwear. Do you have any recommendations that align with my fabric preference and overall requirements?

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear> / Item ID: B08YFLPPDM / Price: $14.18 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features the ultra soft waistband that won't pinch or bind. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Made from ultra soft, breathable ring-spun cotton these panties will keep you feeling fresh all day with Cool Comfort wicking technology. These panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Hipster Underwear."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Hi-Cut> / Item ID: B08YXC41MD / Price: $8.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® hi-cut panty is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-cut, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic high-rise design, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.']
